code: var userInitState=[];var usersReducer=function usersReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:userInitState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'SET_USER':{return[].concat(action.payload);}case'EDIT_USER':{return state.map(function(user){if(user._id===action.payload._id){return Object.assign({},user,action.payload);}else{return Object.assign({},user);}});}default:{return[].concat(state);}}};export default usersReducer;
